wikipedia_page.main: Dominic Parker (born July 1964), from Westbere, is a British television personality. He was a cast member on Gogglebox with his wife Stephanie from 2013 until 2016. He also participated in the second series of The Jump. He lives in Sandwich, Kent. He is known as 'The Arctic Fox'. He suffered concussion while filming The Jump. He participated on the Channel 4 'catch me if you can'-style show Hunted with his wife, Stephanie. He owns a Grade I listed house in Kent, designed by Edwin Lutyens. They run it as a bed and breakfast, The Salutation, which featured in Channel 4's "Four in a Bed". In 2019, Parker appeared as a contestant in Celebrity Masterchef.
